title: Who can help me with my personal essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: As it is rightly said more you will roaming outside more experience you will gain. Before writing personal essay try to judging what's happening in your surroundings by observing the people and it adds a good source of data putting in the essays and alsoo don't wait for any matter or someone for writting an essay just start up and write step by step when you become habbited to write then start using external sources like wikkipedia etc. for improving the grammar which result an essay becomes reflective
